Talk_00_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> Mister, I felt a cold breeze coming
from your pouch.
Talk_00_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You know the reason I like making
arrows? It's my papa. He creates the
strongest bows around!<sp:0:4:0>I wanted to make arrows that'd go
perfectly with his bows.<sp:0:4:0>All I have to do is keep working hard,
getting my name out there, and one day...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I'll be a world-famous arrow maker!
One my papa can be proud of!
Talk_00_20_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>My papa told me you can use <clr:0000>ice fruit <clr:ffff>to
freeze monsters solid!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Which gave me an amazing idea for an
invention, mwaha.
Talk_00_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseL_01>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> Mister, what's that you've got?<sp:5:1:0>
That's the <clr:0000>ice fruit <clr:ffff>I wanted, isn't it?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Can I have one? Pleeease?
Talk_00_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>What am I gonna do? Without <clr:0000>ice fruit<clr:ffff>,
I can't make my invention!

You go to all the trouble coming up with
an idea, and it sits there, taking up space
in your head... <sp:5:1:0>Gah!
Talk_00_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseL_01>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> Mister, what's that you've got?
That's the <clr:0000>ice fruit <clr:ffff>I wanted, isn't it?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>Whoa! Looks like you've also got some
cold, jellylike stuff!
Talk_00_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Problem is...<sp:5:1:0>I can't go and pick the fruit,
since Papa always tells me not to go out
on my own.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Sad>Ugh, it's so not fair! This is the best
invention I've come up with in so long.
But without <clr:0000>ice fruit<clr:ffff>, I can't make it.
Talk_00_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, but I'm on my way home. I've got
work to do.
Talk_00_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseL_01>No way!<sp:5:1:0> What's that stuff you've got?
That cold, jellylike stuff!
Talk_00_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_01>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>You need something, mister?<sp:5:1:0>
'Cause I'm actually kinda busy.
Talk_00_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Is that <clr:0000>white Chuchu jelly<clr:ffff>, from one of the
monsters that'll freeze you solid if you
touch it?
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Wahoo! Waha! <sp:5:0:0>It's not exactly what I
had in mind, but I bet I can use that to
make my big invention!
Oops, I almost forgot. <sp:5:1:0>Manners.<sp:0:4:0>May I please have one, mister, sir?
Talk_00_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Yaaay! Now I can finally make
my invention!<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive_01>When I <clr:0000>attach <clr:ffff>this to the <clr:0000>tip of an arrow<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
I'll have an arrow that can freeze
monsters from far away!
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Sometimes I'm so smart, I scare myself
a little.<sp:0:4:0>I wonder what would happen with <clr:0000>other
materials<clr:ffff>... <sp:5:0:0>You could make <clr:0000>arrows with
all sorts of effects<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Wow, listen to me. With every breath,
I spew out brilliance! <sp:5:0:0>Fwaaa!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease>But I should probably stop talking before
I give away all my best ideas...<sp:0:4:0>Anyway, here's a thank-you present.
Talk_00_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Is that <clr:0000>white Chuchu jelly<clr:ffff>, from one of the
monsters that'll freeze you solid if you
touch it?
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Wow! <sp:5:0:0>It's not exactly what I had in
mind, but I bet I can use that to make
my big invention!
May I have one of either the <clr:0000>ice fruit <clr:ffff>or
the <clr:0000>white Chuchu jelly<clr:ffff>, please?
Talk_00_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseL_01>...Huh?<sp:5:1:0> Mister, what's that you've got?<sp:5:1:0>
That's <clr:0000>white Chuchu jelly<clr:ffff>, isn't it?!<sp:0:4:0>Can I have one? Pleeeease?
Talk_00_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>Ah! Mister, it looks like you've got the
<clr:0000>ice fruit <clr:ffff>I wanted!<sp:0:4:0>And look at that! You also have <clr:0000>white
Chuchu jelly<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>I'd be suuuper happy if you gave me
one of either of them! <sp:5:0:0>Please?
Talk_00_45:
<clr:0000>Ice fruit<clr:ffff>! <clr:0000>Ice fruit<clr:ffff>! <clr:0000>Ice fruit<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>...Nope. Looks like wishing for them
didn't work. <sp:0:4:0>I guess I'll never be able to test my
invention and see if it really does <clr:0000>freeze<clr:ffff>
monsters solid.
Talk_00_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>My problem is...<sp:5:1:0>I can't go out to pick
fruit right now, with the blizzard and all.

<snd:Sad>Ugh, it's so not fair! This is the best
invention I've come up with in so long.
But without <clr:0000>ice fruit<clr:ffff>, I can't make it.
